description: Introduction of Mayhem 2.0 and start of Revenge of the Cartels event. Also the start of the first Loot the Universe mini-event, on Pandora. Disabling of Slaughter Onslaught and Making It Rain events.
All the loot tinks and 100% unique drop rates.
Use this one if you want a Hellwalker after graveward (among other things).
Buffed the crit and hail, and beginning of Broken Hearts 2021.
Nerfed commitment. Also relaunched the Show Me The Eridium and April Fools events.
Lowered the world drop rates in mayhem, but increased them in early game.
Buffed the rewards from trials - if you're fast enough you get 4 guarenteed legendaries. Also added dedicated drops to DLC2 Gear, and made slaughter bosses drop 500 eridium.
Buffed the T.K's Wave. Also activated the True Trial of Survival.
Nerfed a bunch of useful annointments such as consecutive hits and 300/90. Also enabled all true trials and buffed event bosses.
Droughts: COMs, SMGs; Ascension: Snipers; Devil's Razor: ARs, Grenades; Splinterlands: Pistols; Carnivora: ARs, Shields; Guts: Launchers; Konrad's: SMGs; Catherdal: Artifacts, Shotguns
Outskirts: Shotguns; Metroplex: Snipers, Artifacts; Athenas: Pistols, Shields; Lectra: SMGs; Skywell: Launchers, Grenades; HQ: ARs, COMs; Arterial: Shotguns
Floodmoor: Pistols, COMs; Anvil: SMGs; Estate: ARs, Shields; Voracious: Snipers; Ambermire: Shotguns, Grenades; Blackbarrel: Launchers, Artifacts
